Flying

rulings.text: As Goremand's triggered ability resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it's an opponent's turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses a creature they control, then each other opponent in turn order does the same knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.

mainBoard.name: Launch Party

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target when Launch Party tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No player will lose 2 life.

If you sacrifice an attacking or blocking creature during the declare blockers step, it won’t deal combat damage. If you wait until the combat damage step, but that creature is dealt lethal damage, it’ll be destroyed before you get a chance to sacrifice it.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.

foreignData.flavorText: „Du hast so eifrig genommen und verzehrt. Und wenn du selbst etwas geben sollst, weigerst du dich?"

foreignData.text:
Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: "Estabas impaciente por tomar y consumir. Y, sin embargo, cuando se te pide que des, ¿te niegas?".
foreignData.name: Ritos de pueblo
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica una criatura.
Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vous aviez tellement hâte de vous servir et de vous nourrir. Mais quand il s'agit de donner, vous refusez ? »
foreignData.name: Rites du village
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez une créature.
Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sembravi così impaziente di prendere e consumare. Eppure, quando ti viene chiesto di dare, rifiuti?"
foreignData.name: Riti del Villaggio
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica una creatura.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 「汝らは喜んで受け取り消費するではないか。それが、与える段になると拒むのかね？」
foreignData.name: 村の儀式
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。
カードを２枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "자네는 취하고 소비하는 데에는 아주 적극적이었지. 그러고서는 이제 달라고 하니, 거절하는 겐가?"
foreignData.name: 마을의 의식
foreignData.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
카드 두 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Você estava tão disposto a tomar e consumir. Mas quando pedimos que você dê algo, você recusa?"
foreignData.name: Ritos da Vila
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, sacrifique uma criatura.
Compre dois cards.

foreignData.flavorText: «Ты всегда был готов взять что-то, сожрать. Но когда тебя просят поделиться, ты отказываешься?»
foreignData.name: Деревенские Обряды
foreignData.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания пожертвуйте существо.
Возьмите две карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 「要吃要喝的时候如此积极。要你奉献的时候却摆手拒绝？」
foreignData.name: 村民仪式
foreignData.text:
牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓两张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「要吃要喝的時候如此積極。要你奉獻的時候卻擺手拒絕？」
foreignData.name: 村民儀式
foreignData.text:
犧牲一個生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
抽兩張牌。

mainBoard.name: Village Rites
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you can't cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you can't sacrifice additional creatures.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: The best recipes start with reliable cookware.
